metadata.title: CVE-2021-20313 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in ImageMagick in versions before 7.0.11. A potential cipher leak when the calculate signatures in TransformSignature is possible. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality.

notes.note: mdeslaur> same fix as CVE-2021-20312 rayveldkamp> imagemagick is in universe from focal onwards

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
